paper_abstract: We study the optimization of dynamic pricing in a queueing model with a finite buffer, where arrival rates depend on advertised price levels. We apply our study to a pricing policy in a cloud computing service provider setup. The main result of this paper is the multi-threshold structure of the optimal policy. (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: MDP based optimal pricing for a cloud computing queueing model
